alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 3:47AM EDT until March 28 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting up to 30 mph will produce some blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Chautauqua and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
